cast.name: 阿尔赛纳·温格 Arsène Wenger
丹尼斯·博格坎普 Dennis Bergkamp

introduction: 亨利打进他在阿森纳的第186球之前，俱乐部的进球记录一直是由伊恩赖特保持着。这288场比赛记载了他荣耀的射手历程，奖杯、教练、队友以及对手。伊恩的热情一直在燃烧！Ian Wright's legendary strike-ratio at Arsenal achieved a staggering 185 goals in 288 games (a record at the time) which, coupled with his extravagant on-field celebrations, stays fresh in the memory of many fans.Ever candid, Ian talks about his finest Arsenal moments, trophies won, managers, team-mates and toughest opponents, his brushes with the football authorities, his still burning passion for the Club and the fans. Includes every Arsenal goal (and celebration) plus interviews with many of his former team-mates and managers.
